titleStmt.title: The testimony of a cloud of witnesses who in their generation have testified against that horrible evil of forcing of conscience, and persecution about matters of religion ... / composed together, and translated into English, by ... William Caton.
titleStmt.author: Caton, William, 1636-1665.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: pages tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
